free_text.Content: [li] Comparing different styles of scientific articles[br/][li] Comparing and commenting on a good and bad article[br/][li] Organizing the structure of a research article[br/][li] Writing a research proposal[br/][li] Grammar in scientific articles[br/][li] Readability exercises[br/][li] Peer reviewing each other's writing[br/][li] On the 4th day each student will have inividual coaching of 30 minutes on some writing of their choice.[br/]
